attributes.action: Hold a Parliamentary Referendum amongst MPs on how to leave the EU
attributes.additional_details: Therefore MPs should be forced to choose by holding a Parliamentary Referendum between leaving with No Deal or leaving with the recently Negotiated Withdrawal Agreement. To be clear, this is to be a referendum amongst MPs only.
attributes.background: The people have voted to exit The EU. It’s now parliament’s job to choose the method of exit. Currently parliament is split with many voting against all options.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because we're not clear how this would differ from a vote in the House of Commons.
